Preterit Intransitive.text: ab=bote qaḥili ʻdie (alten) Häuser brachen zusammenʼ; 325;

Infectum.text: I+tərto lo kəmqaḥmo ʕal u+čelikayḏa (Ilyas p.c. 5-01-2021)

idioms: II ‘to love’ (mostly about animals and their small ones). The basic meaning is about a cow, a she-goat, etc.: she either accepts her new-born or not. This is what qḥm II initially means
